text: "The Love Cats" is a 1983 song by English gothic rock The Cure as a stand- alone single. It went to number 6 in Australia, number 7 in the United Kingdom, number 15 in Ireland and number 23 in New Zealand. ==Track listing== ; 7" #"The Love Cats" (3:33) #"Speak My Language" (2:39) ;UK & US 12" #"The Love Cats (Extended Version)" (4:37) #"Speak My Language" (2:39) #"Mr. Pink Eyes" (2:45) == References == Category:1983 songs Category:The Cure songs
title: The Love Cats (song)
